text: Qunu [ˈk͡ǃuːnu] is a small rural village in South Africa's Eastern Cape Province. It is south-west of Mthatha on the road between Butterworth and Mthatha. Nelson Mandela spent his childhood here and had a retirement home there. On 15 December 2013, Mandela was buried in Qunu after a state funeral."Mandela funeral brings together world's most powerful people". The Guardian. retrieved 11 May 2014. == References == == Related pages == *More about the Nelson Mandela Museum at Qunu Category:Settlements in South Africa Category:Villages in Africa Category:Eastern Cape
title: Qunu
